@version 1

# for the first 8 seconds a full screen movie plays
# then up to 11.3 seconds the title mask is visible
# at 11.3 seconds is the POP when the title appears

#milliseconds, lamp group, add duration, [color], [option]

# phase 1 - 'chase' clockwise starting from the top left
